title: Hour 1: Legend of Luka
description:
In this episode, Courtney Cronin, Domonique Foxworth, and Kendrick Perkins debate Kevin Durant's possible landing spots across the league in the wake of his request to be traded from the Brooklyn Nets. Plus, with Golden State seemingly in the mix, the crew decides what would happen to his legacy if KD returned to the Warriors. Courtney, Domonique, and Perk also tackle the question of whether or not Luka Doncic will bring Dallas any titles after his declaration of loyalty to the Mavericks organization. Also covered in this episode; how do we feel about the NBA play-in tournament? Opinions fly as the crew decides if they're in or out on making the play-in tournament a permanent fixture of the NBA season. Later, Louis Riddick joins the show to debate which AFC West quarterback has the most at stake this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Will Luka Doncic win multiple titles with the Mavericks?
